Room.Name: The Shrine of Truth
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered the Etolian Druid's Shrine of Truth.
Room.LongDescription: The druids believe strongly in six basic virtues, and have built up a shrine in dedication of each. The Shrine of Truth is dedicated (quite obviously) to truth. Withouth truth, there would be no honesty and no honor. The druids hold truth as one of their most important virtues.
